## LoaderOptions.dracoDecoderPath property

A path to that contains the draco library. e.g: `https://unpkg.com/three@0.129.0/examples/js/libs/draco` - Default: `undefined`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dracoDecoderPath?: string;
```
